sentences.en: Assuredness, rose, that is the color of a kind of blood!
sentences.cn: 确实, 玫瑰, 那是一种血的色彩!

sentences.en: Clinging to outside sources indicates a lack of assuredness inwardly.
sentences.cn: 依赖于外部情报源,表明你缺乏内在的确信.

sentences.en: Life is happier if it is full of easiness and assuredness.
sentences.cn: 生命是非常美好的,如果生活中充满了从容与自信的话.

sentences.en: Probably and yes, his assuredness are too tired.
sentences.cn: 或许是的, 他确实太累了.

sentences.en: Self - assuredness is also crucial for one activity that freelancers absolutely must engage in: self - promotion.
sentences.cn: 自信 也是自由职业者必须要碰到的一项工作 —— 自我 推销当中很关键的一点.

sentences.en: This is a lyrical work written with the authority and assuredness of an experienced writer.
sentences.cn: 这部抒情作品由一位有经验的作家以老练、自信的笔触写成。

sentences.en: Yellow is a traditional tie colour in countries, including England, which can signal assuredness, along with radiance and vitality, he said.
sentences.cn: 他说，在很多国家，包括在英国，黄色是传统的领带色。它给人一种自信、活力的跃动感。

words.tran_cn: 保证的；确信的；使人有信心的
保证；担保；使确信；弄清楚
